group_1.textLeft: So, now that we've patrolled the village, @got any ideas?

group_1.textRight: Nothing at all here...
The shrine still smells as weird as ever, @but that's about it.
I went to Mikoshiba's house, but didn't find anything @particularly amiss...

group_1.textLeft: Same here, actually.
I patrolled over there while double-checking that @everyone was safe, but found nothing worth @mentioning...
Did we all really not feel anything...?

group_1.textRight: I can sense a Devil's presence.
But, how should I say this...it feels flat, even...
There's slight changes every so often, but the @intensity of the reaction remains the same...
I think I'm feeling the same thing?
I was just searching around for everybody, thinking @"wow, it sure hasn't changed much."
What about you, Shizuka?

group_1.textLeft: The same as you two, unfortunately...
Even an idea about whether it's approaching or @leaving would be good...

group_1.textRight: Maybe it's constantly moving and keeping a set @distance from us?

group_1.textLeft: Wouldn't it be impossible to keep the same distance @from all three of us...?

group_1.textRight: Hmn, right...

group_1.textLeft: Perhaps the response is changing slightly because @it's hiding somewhere...?

group_1.textRight: Hiding somewhere, being hidden...hmm, @you might be on to something.
At times like these, I ask Kouichi Todoroki!

group_1.textLeft: Who?
Ah, the character from that drama?

group_1.textRight: You know him, Sunao?!

group_1.textLeft: Just the name, not much else.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: So, what can this Mr. Todoroki do?

group_1.textRight: I put myself in the shoes of Mr. Todoroki as he's @solving a case, and ask him!
Hmnーーー
Mr. Todoroki, this presence stays the same @no matter how much we move.
What should we do at a time like this?!

group_1.narration: If you're absolutely sure that the culprit @is lurking nearby, try taking a moment
to remove the map from your mind. @Think carefully, with that in mind.
In today's world, that little thing @called 'truth' may be lying somewhere

group_1.textRight: Phew... That's what Mr. Todoroki told me.

group_1.textLeft: "Told"...? You were just talking to yourself in a funny @voice...

group_1.textRight: Playing the part makes me feel like I've gotten @smarter...!
I agree that it's a perspective we've largely ignored @so far, though...
Considering the differences between two and three @dimensions...

group_1.textLeft: Got an idea...?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
To make matters quick, I think it's underground.

group_1.textLeft: Underground...?

group_1.textRight: If you think about it from a two-dimensional @perspective,
the distance from us to the Devil should have been @shrinking, eventually approaching zero meters.
But if it were somewhere 200 meters below ground,
the difference in the Devil's presence as we moved, @if any, wouldn't feel very significant.
The sky looks pretty empty to me, so if it's anywhere, @I bet it'd be underground!

group_1.textLeft: But is there anywhere to hide beneath the village...?
[chara:102500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]——?!

group_1.textRight: Do you know a place...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Just one...!

group_1.textRight: By the way, have all the villagers gathered here?
It's an emergency, so has anyone evacuated @elsewhere? The Grand Shrine, for instance?

group_1.textLeft: No, everyone ought to be here.
The Grand Shrine...!

group_1.textRight: Where's that?

group_1.textLeft: It's behind the kagura stage that you went past. @In the same place as that old shrine building...

group_1.textRight: The awful-smelling place...!

group_1.textLeft: Charu, you might have been sensing it from the @very beginning...
That little thing called 'truth' might be lying @somewhere much closer than we expected.

group_1.textRight: Exactly!
Then, let's go.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. We're almost out of time, after all― @let's hurry to the Grand Shrine.
